title: Single-Writer Append-Only Logs
abstract: An in-depth look at cryptographically secure append-only logs, the data structures powering blockchain-less peer-to-peer protocols such as [Secure Scuttlebutt](https://scuttlebutt.nz/), [Hypercore (Dat)](https://dat.foundation/), or [Holochain](https://holochain.org/).
description:
Without requiring prior knowledge of the peer-to-peer world, we examine the fundamentals of the single-writer append-only log that forms the heart of a variety of new-ish protocols for decentralized communication. Planned topics:

- how does the data structure work?
- why do we care?
- dealing with forks
- efficient partial verification/replication
